00067 #define MS_PER_TICK (1)
00068 
00069 
00076 
00077 
00078 #define TIMER_INIT() TCCR(TICKTIMER,B) |= (1 << CS(TICKTIMER,1)) |  \
00079         (1 << WGM(TICKTIMER,2)), OCR(TICKTIMER,A) = (MS_PER_TICK * 1000 /\
00080                                                      (8000000UL/F_CPU))
00082 //#define TIMER_STOP() (TCCR(TICKTIMER,B) = 0)
00084 #define TIMER_CLEAR() (TCNT(TICKTIMER) = 0)
00086 #define TIMER_ENABLE() (TIMSK(TICKTIMER) = (1 << OCIE(TICKTIMER,A)))
00088 #define TIMER_STOP() (TIMSK(TICKTIMER) &= ~(1 << OCIE(TICKTIMER,A)))
00090 #define TICKVECT COMPVECT(TICKTIMER)   // IAR doesn't accept this macro inside the ISR() macro
00091 
00095 #endif
